== Kattakampal (CT) (627761) ==

Kattakampal (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 8.73 sq. km. and harbouring 2697 households with total population of 11836 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 350 km. Male population is 5419 and female population is 6417. Scheduled Caste population is 2178 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627761<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 32 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 112 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 30 km.
